entry.title: Replying to @account57959 all figures in this came from chatGPT which may have pulled these figures out of its proverbial. but the point still stands, we often make accomodations for the 1%, often with unexpected benefits for others too. a trans inclusiv
entry.content: Replying to @account57959 all figures in this came from chatGPT which may have pulled these figures out of its proverbial. but the point still stands, we often make accomodations for the 1%, often with unexpected benefits for others too. a trans inclusive health service is trauma informed with person centred care. what's not to love? oh and in case it isn't obvious I definitely *do* think we should make accomodations for d/Deaf people, blind people and yes, even vegetarians. #trans #AI #chatgpt #transgender #pregnancy #healthcare #troll #lgbt #1

entry.title: choices choices I'm choosing to make changes in my life that bring me joy and I hope you have the opportunity to do the same #trans #joy #choice #choose #lgbt #lgbtq #queertok #pregnancy #parents

entry.title: Replying to @emrhibee if someone falls pregnant and wants to continue a pregnancy then they must stop taking it immediately. this is no different than if someone is on any meds that can impact a pregnancy. I train midwives to refer to obstetrician care i
entry.content: Replying to @emrhibee if someone falls pregnant and wants to continue a pregnancy then they must stop taking it immediately. this is no different than if someone is on any meds that can impact a pregnancy. I train midwives to refer to obstetrician care if there's an overlap of testosterone with pregnancy and this is just another reason why training is so important. #trans #testosterone #hormones #pregnancy #obstetrics #midwifery

entry.title: Replying to @saibuh being pregnant is hard, being trans (in our society) is hard. being trans and pregnant brings extra layers of difficulty. by making perinatal services more trans inclusive we can make hundreds and hundreds of people's lives better ever
entry.content: Replying to @saibuh being pregnant is hard, being trans (in our society) is hard. being trans and pregnant brings extra layers of difficulty. by making perinatal services more trans inclusive we can make hundreds and hundreds of people's lives better every year, for the thousands that come after us. you can find out more about what I do in my (link) in (bio). #trans #midwife #pregnancy #pregnant #obstetrics #inclusion #diversity #transgender #perinatalmentalhealth

entry.title: Replying to @30yearoldlady when trans people get together irl the thing we talk about the least is gender. there's no struggle or expectations, we just exist as humans, trusting that the person in front of us knows best who they are. gender is at its most
entry.content: Replying to @30yearoldlady when trans people get together irl the thing we talk about the least is gender. there's no struggle or expectations, we just exist as humans, trusting that the person in front of us knows best who they are. gender is at its most boring when it's cisnormative, rigid and imposed. #trans #transgender #gender

entry.title: nonbinaries of all grump levels welcome 💛🤍💜🖤 also just a reminder that nonbinary people can use any pronouns (including "gendered" ones and can look any way that feels right to them. #nonbinaryday #enby #nonbinary #trans
entry.content: nonbinaries of all grump levels welcome 💛🤍💜🖤 also just a reminder that nonbinary people can use any pronouns (including "gendered" ones and can look any way that feels right to them. #nonbinaryday #enby #nonbinary #trans

entry.title: at 11 years old I couldn't see a world with me in it. it sometimes feels miraculous that I'm still here at all. it feels incredible to conceive that I have the chance to live until I see that older man in the mirror. when we say "protect trans youth", w
entry.content: at 11 years old I couldn't see a world with me in it. it sometimes feels miraculous that I'm still here at all. it feels incredible to conceive that I have the chance to live until I see that older man in the mirror. when we say "protect trans youth", we're talking from experience as the trans youth that needed protecting. #trans #oldagefilter #mentalhealth
